TextLines: <color=yellow> SolidRusT Networks NOLAG™ game hosting. </color>
- Useful CCTV Utilities, motion sensors and Dancing emotes
- Improved recycling, recycle anything!
- Furnace stacking guide and smelting speed increase.
- Escalated Bradley APC combat levels
- Blueprint Sharing and Workbench range increased
- Clans Tools, Team Chats and Rust+ Mobile App enabled
- Real-time Hit and Damage indicators, Realistic Explosions
- Improved Weather and heath effects
<color=yellow>1</color> - Kill On Sight (KOS) is discouraged, but still allowed. Use your Voice comms.
<color=yellow>2</color> - Max group limit of 8 players, including alliances.
<color=yellow>3</color> - No admins, moderators or any other human will censor chat (just bots).
<color=yellow>4</color> - use the in-game chat censor/filter to block unwanted content on your own.
<color=yellow>5</color> - Do not call out hackers in chat, report them using <color=yellow> F7</color>.
<color=yellow>6</color> - No cheating, scripting, bug abuse or otherwise exploiting the game.
<color=yellow>7</color> - Griefing / PvP / Raids / Base Takovers is allowed and encouraged.
<color=yellow> /bgrade </color>     - Set the default Resource Grade when building
<color=yellow> /bs </color>         - Blueprint Sharing settings
<color=yellow> /buildcar </color>   - Build sedan for a cost
<color=yellow> /cctv </color>       - CCTV Security Camera tools
<color=yellow> /claim </color>      - Claim donation code
<color=yellow> /clanhelp </color>   - Clan management commands
<color=yellow> /cnv </color>        - Chill Night Vision add-on
<color=yellow> /copykey </color>    - Copy Sedan ignition key
<color=yellow> /dance </color>      - Dancing emote
<color=yellow> /deaths </color>     - Show last death locations
<color=yellow> /farmtools </color>  - Manage farming, clones, ect..
<color=yellow> /flipcar </color>    - Flip upside down sedans
<color=yellow> /friend </color>     - Manage Friends list
<color=yellow> /fs </color>         - Furnace stack splitter settings
<color=yellow> /hit </color>        - disable/enable hit markers
<color=yellow> /hotwire </color>    - attempt to hot wire a vehicle
<color=yellow> /info </color>       - Show this info / help panel
<color=yellow> /kdr </color>            - Kills to Deaths ration
<color=yellow> /phone </color>          - Telephone settings
<color=yellow> /pm </color>             - Private messages
<color=yellow> /pmhistory </color>      - Private Message History
<color=yellow> /r </color>              - Reply to last private message
<color=yellow> /raidalarm </color>      - Rust+ App settings for Raid alarms
<color=yellow> /recycler.craft </color> - Craft a personal recycler
<color=yellow> /remove </color>         - Remover Tool for owned structures
<color=yellow> /setgenes </color>       - Set the genes for the seed you are holding
<color=yellow> /sil </color>            - Add a JPG image URL to a sign
<color=yellow> /silrestore </color>     - Restore JPG image after Rust Updates
<color=yellow> /silt </color>           - Add text to a sign
<color=yellow> /skin </color>           - Free Steam Workshop skins
<color=yellow> /skulls </color>         - Show how many human skulls you have crushed
<color=yellow> /sl </color>             - Security Light configuration
<color=yellow> /sleep </color>          - Go to sleep, save your hunger and hydration
<color=yellow> /sleep </color>   - Go to sleep, save your hunger and hydration
<color=yellow> /stats </color>   - Show your player statistics and ranking
<color=yellow> /tod </color>     - Show Time of Day statistics
<color=yellow> /top </color>     - Show the PvP leaderboard
<color=yellow> /trade </color>   - Remote trading with other players
To enable Key Binds, so you don't have to use the chat commands,
Open the <color=yellow> F1 </color> client console, Customize the key you want to bind
(suggested examples below), pressing enter after each line
<color=yellow> bind k kill </color> - Kill yourself
<color=yellow> bind f2 ''consoletoggle;combatlog'' </color> - open combat log with <color=yellow> F2 </color> key
<color=yellow> bind Mouse1 +lighttoggle;+attack2 </color> - turn on weapon light, when aiming down sights
Each SRT Rank will give you a unique spawn kit, grant bank and backpack space and many other quality of life improvements.
<color=silver> Scavenger </color>    - Default rank for unregistered players and guests.
<color=white> Survivor </color>      - Registered player. can be obtained using <color=yellow> /dc </color> command
<color=green> SolidPlayer </color>   - Verified player. Have connected their steam accounts to <color=orange> solidrust.net </color>
<color=aqua> Supporter </color>      - Contributing Member. Have made a donation, or contributed time to the NOLAG™ network
<color=purple> Legendary </color>    - Team Member. Monthly subscriber or NOLAG™ Staff member.
<color=yellow> Roles are global throughout all NOLAG™ servers and Discord. Rewards are server specific. </color>
See: <color=orange> solidrust.net </color> for more details on server rewards.
See: <color=orange> discord.gg/PpAvPcD46q </color> for community support, Rust news and server updates
